name: Zodplay
description: ZOD Play is a decentralized ecosystem built on the BNB Chain that combines tiered staking, token mining, and a value distribution mechanism based on active participation. The project generates utility for its native token, ZOD, through an integrated economic model that includes: An on-chain floor supported by a USDT-backed liquidity pool; Progressive staking with multiple tiers, where users accumulate ZOD rewards from transaction fees, token burns, and mining allocations; A fair mining system tied to participation in engagement rounds, with proportional distribution based on eligibility criteria; Scheduled trading fee halving mechanisms and anti-manipulation protections at launch. The ecosystem is designed to incentivize long-term retention, align incentives among participants, and sustain internal liquidity through autonomous economic flows and auditable smart contracts.
